name: Misc. A Tiny Tale
storyline:
A mysterious explosion sends golden cogs falling from the sky! It's time to go on an adventure with Buddy and Bag Boy, two tiny robots crafted from miscellaneous parts.

Find items such as coins, golden cogs, lost treasures, and more.
Discover the stories of each robot you encounter, helping them with puzzles and quests.
Collect pieces of trash and recycle them for extra coins.
Make the world a better place by scrubbing away goop.
Dress up with fun outfits in each chapter.

Embrace the joy of making a difference on this unforgettable adventure.
summary: Embark on an adventure as a tiny robot made of miscellaneous parts. Collect trash, coins, cogs, and more as you help friends around you. Make the world a better place, one tiny task at a time.
